instructions: Put the dinner plate on the right side of the table.
Put the fork on the left side of the dinner plate.
Put the salad fork beside the dinner fork.
Put the dinner knife on the right side of the dinner plate
Put the salad knife om the right side of the dinner knife.
Put the soup spoon beside the salad knife.
Put the water glass on the top right side of the dinner plate.
Put the wine glass on the right side of the water glass.
Put a second wine glass directly beside the wine glass that was just placed.
Put the coffee cup beside the soup spoon.
Put the bread plate on the left side of the dinner plate, above the dinner fork.
Put the butter knife on the right side of the bread plate.
Put the dessert fork directly above the dinner plate.
Put the dessert spoon directly above the dessert fork.
Put the napkin in the center of the dinner plate.
